The Peru Billie Jean King Cup team represents Peru in the Billie Jean King Cup tennis competition and are governed by the .  They currently compete in the Americas Zone Group I.
History
Peru competed in its first Fed Cup in 1982.  Their best result was reaching the round of 16 in their debut year.
